text: Show them, tell them, have them do it, and then praise them; otherwise, people won't do anything. Speak to them, hear them out, recognize them, and give them responsibility; otherwise, they will never grow. Watch them work with gratitude, and show your faith in them; otherwise, they will never truly blossom.
attribution: — Yamamoto Isoroku, as quoted in Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation (Light Novel) Vol. 3 by Rifujin na Magonote

text: Being nice is what got you here. Being kind is what’s gonna get you out.
“There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.”
attribution: ― Ernest Hemingway, as quoted in Kingsman: The Secret Service by Harry Hart
